cars.title: 1972 DE TOMASO PANTERA
highlights: An iconic merger of beautiful Italian styling, and legendary Ford V8 performance
Presented in good condition inside and out, benefiting from previous refurbishment
Offered in very good mechanical health, with a recent engine overhaul to note
Stands as a very rare, pre-L US specification example

cars.title: 1982 MERCEDES-BENZ G-WAGEN PICKUP
highlights: This Long-Wheel-Base G-Wagon Pickup, has recently enjoyed a comprehensive restoration and upgrade to Mercedes 4. 3 V8 power
During the restoration the G-Wagen was stripped to a bare chassis, which was blasted and then treated with etch primer and three coats of two-pack paint
